item.description:
[b]"THE BIGGEST SINGLES EVENT IN BOSTON ALL YEAR."

“HAWAIIAN LUAU” SINGLES DANCE and 14th ANNUAL BOSTON HARBOR CRUISE.
SATURDAY EVENING, JULY 24, Gate C, Rowes Wharf, Atlantic Ave., Boston, 6:30 to 10 PM.

Bon Voyage Party, with complimentary hors d’oeuvres, 5 –6:30.
Cruise and dancing on ship 6:30 –10, with complimentary food & desserts provided onboard. ALL THE FOOD YOU CAN EAT, & SOME TO TAKE HOME.
Music will be provided by CHRIS ZIENKO. Limited to 180 WOMEN & 180 MEN, 35-60 y.o.
Island or casual attire.
SORRY, WOMEN ALREADY SOLD OUT.

Cost is ONLY $45. Call (781)283-0400 for reservations. ORDER YOUR TICKETS RIGHT AWAY...ALWAYS SOLD OUT. DON'T BE LEFT ON THE DOCK. See pictures of prior cruises on our website,
www.se-4u.com.
Sponsored by The Singles Executives Club, The Single CEO Club, NE Singles Cruises and The Young Professionals Club.
Check out: www.LawyerRage.com.
item.name: BOSTON HARBOR SINGLE CRUISE
